title: 30 Amazon Prime Day Patio Furniture Deals Up to 63% Off (2025)
description: The second day of the summer sale is unfurling all new markdowns
author: Blake Bakkila
excerpt: Shop the best Prime Day patio furniture deals on umbrellas, wicker egg chairs, plant stands, and more for deep discounts
text: Last updated 5:02 pm. With summer halfway over, we’re all trying to get outdoors as much as humanly possible, and thankfully, these Prime Day patio furniture deals are here to beautify that plot of land back there you call a yard (kidding, kidding). This year, Amazon has chosen to drop their biggest shopping event of the year, besides Prime Big Deal Days in October of course, over four days this week extending through Friday July 11th.Featured in this articleA Goes-With-Everything Outdoor SofaSignature Design by Ashley Outdoor SofaJump to reviewThe Chic Dining SetChristopher Knight Home Hermosa Dining Set (Set of 5)Jump to reviewA Versatile Dining TableChristopher Knight Home Spanish Bay Outdoor Dining TableJump to reviewA few other things remain consistent with Prime Day, no matter how chaotic this summer sale can be: The deals extend to many of the same items, including weather-resistant dining sets, stylish outdoor sectionals and sofa sets, hardy woven patio chairs and ottomans, and even some aesthetically pleasing fire pits. That means it can be easy to single out what to look for, which our team has already done for you.Whether you’re looking for grills for summer BBQs, some more prime seating for poolside lounging, or simply dreaming about refreshing a few of your outdoor pieces that stay out on the lawn in all seasons (we see you, Californians), there are a ton of home deals worth shopping now. We scoped out all the patio furniture deals and curated some of our favorites below. And if you’re really in the mood to shop, learn more about our Amazon favorites and review our top choices for furniture, mattresses, sheets, and bath towels.Prime Day Patio Furniture Deals: Outdoor Couches and Patio SetsWhether you’re seeking out an outdoor sofa or a conversation set, there’s lots of lounge-worthy outdoor furniture to peruse.Signature Design By Ashley Paradise Trail SofaIt’s not every day that one of our favorite outdoor sofas go on sale, but this one (tested by contributor Kristi Kellogg) ranks among the best Prime Day deals we’ve seen so far. “Big, beautiful, and built to last, this sofa has a higher back, deeper seats, and thicker cushions than anything else I could find,” she wrote in her review. “It’s as comfortable as our indoor sofa, and I could easily stretch out and take a nap on it (as could my husband, who’s 6’3).” Even a year later, she said it’s held up so well that she completed her collection with the coordinating swivel chairs and loveseat (Psst…those are on sale, too!).Yitahome Outdoor Wicker LoveseatAt more than half off, it’s hard to pass on this space-saving rattan loveseat with cushions (plus removable and washable covers!). Add it to a small balcony in a high-rise or create a cozy corner in an expansive backyard with a coordinating coffee table and wicker sofa.Signature Design by Ashley Horizon Hall SofaAt first glance, this sofa looks like it was made for your living room. But with weather-resistant wicker and washable performance fabric, it’s all about the outdoors. Tuck it under a pergola and set up a new hangout spot with natural hues to match your surroundings.Yopto Sectional Patio SetWhile it’s not a traditional Prime Day deal, this patio set does come with a special coupon for $104 off, so you can take home this coastal-inspired eucalyptus wood couch and coffee table for 13% off.East Oak Courtyard Patio SetThis beauty of a four-piece set includes a padded loveseat, two roomy armchairs, and a glass coffee table for all of your outdoor hosting.Prime Day Patio Furniture Deals: Patio Dining SetsCreate an inviting atmosphere at a more inviting price with these discounts on tables, chairs, or outdoor dining sets for a combo of the two.Christopher Knight Home Davina Outdoor Dining Chair (Set of 2)The perforated design and bold yellow colorway are transporting us to iconic midcentury modern homes and hotels in Palm Springs. They’re fun, bold, and fortunately for your wallet, 15% off for a limited time.Flash Furniture Lila Bistro SetOr create a more permanent fixture with this three-piece bistro set, including a table with a glass top. Under an awning or cantilever umbrella, you can sip and dine here all summer long.Christopher Knight Home Spanish Bay Outdoor Dining TableAdd this dining table to the list, too. The industrial metal legs contrast the rustic farmhouse-style acacia wood tabletop.Grand Patio Premium Frame Patio Bistro SetSo many bistro sets come in splash colorways that it’s kinda nice to buy an all-black set for a gothic summer vibe. This one is blessed with a steel powder-coated frame and backed by thousands of positive reviews.Best Choice Products Patio Dining Chairs (Set of 2)Marked down in both colorways (natural/ivory and gray/black), these woven wicker chairs just need an outdoor table for a comfy patio conversation set. Come winter, they can double as indoor seating for additional guests.Christopher Knight Home Hermosa Dining Set (Set of 5)We’ve been holding out hope that some of our favorite Christopher Knight Home items would go on sale, and the brand finally delivered with markdowns on tons of best-sellers. Take this five-piece outdoor furniture set, for example, which is made with acacia wood and has water-resistant cushions for more comfortable lounging.Prime Day Patio Furniture Deals: Outdoor Chairs, Hammocks, and Bar SetsAmazon is slashing prices on classic hammocks and Adirondack chairs, in addition to long chaises for sunbathing and rocking chairs.Flash Furniture Mystic Folding Patio Sling Chairs (Set of 2)For an impromptu backyard bash, tailgating, or even poolside seating, these sling chairs with a mesh back are just the thing for sitting back in comfort. Deceptively lightweight, they even include a foot rest for propping up your toes off the lawn.Novogratz Poolside Gossip Priscilla Folding Chairs (Set of 2)These chairs are the quintessential outdoor throne of the season—quite simply made to watch the encroaching sunburns of your little ones who promised they SPFed. Alloy steel and nylon mean these can soak in water without issue but need a thorough sun dry afterwards to drive away mildew and rust.Safavieh Chaise Lounge ChairDecorate like a designer when you snag these Safavieh lounge chairs, which you can find in Justina Blakeney’s vibrant Los Angeles backyard. Select colors and patterns are discounted, including striped options fit for the Amalfi Coast (or a yard inspired by it).Shintenchi 3-Piece Outdoor Rocking Bistro SetPowder-coated steel makes this set rust- and UV-resistant, which is good because it’s sure to become one of your favorite places to daydream. These seats are modern and chic, and they’re ready to blend right in with any existing design style you’re working with.YitaHome Outdoor Narrow Egg ChairConsider this our humble plea to add a funky egg chair to your patio. All variations are discounted right now, so you can choose one with an ottoman or a swiveling seat. It already comes with back and seat cushions, but plop down one of our favorite outdoor throw pillows to complete the look.Arden Outdoor Chaise CushionWhether you’re prioritizing style or comfort, new cushions can lend both elements to your personal lounge area. French Blue Linen (shown here) offers muted colors fit for a countryside cottage, plus there are several striped patterns that could coordinate with Nice’s iconic beach umbrellas.Y- Stop Hammock Hanging Rope Swing ChairIf you have access to a hanging spot for this cozy outdoor chair, you’ll love taking afternoon naps day after day. There’s a removable steel bar, in case you want to add some more structure to the seat—but we wouldn’t blame you for cocooning right into its folds without it.Signature Design by Ashley Danson Swivel Lounge Chair (Set of 2)These wicker lounge chairs are inviting by design, with a curved frame and plenty of supportive cushioning. And did we mention they swivel? Survey your yard or move with the sun throughout the day without lifting a finger, or create a conversation set with this end table.Prime Day Grilling and Chilling Deals: Coolers and Cooking AppliancesThough it’s not explicitly furniture, don’t act like you’re not enthused to see some Traegers and Yetis on this list, too. Your next outdoor bash or beachside hang deserves some attention to the cookware and coolers you’re bound up grilling with and using to stuff to the brim with ice and beverages.Traeger Grills TFB30KLF Tailgater Electric Wood Pellet Grill and SmokerThis is the sort of barbecue you see in the backyard when you know you’re about to have the best grilled shrimp of your life and the zucchini coming off this thing will be crisp and juicy—not the stretch-marked cardboard you’ve come to accept. The wood pellet grill infuses everything with the campfire flavor you’re after, and portability means you can easily drag it to the cul-de-sac to star in your block parties.Cuisinart Chef's Style Tabletop Propane Gas GrillThis portable, hassle-free grill banishes the threat of a grill-free summer. There’s no longer any excuse not to be snacking on roasted red pepper all season. Twist start electric ignition and 22 pounds nearly make this model kid-friendly, if you’re keen on sharing the ways of the grillmaster.Ninja FrostVault CoolerImagine a cold sandwich on the beach, cheese that isn’t sweaty, ham that isn’t room temp, watermelon that maintains its crunch—now imagine 45 quarts of that with something called frostovault technology that’s 20% off. Plus this has a handle and wheels, so you can take it off-roading when the moment calls.Yeti Tundra 45 CoolerNo cooler on the planet has the same name recognition of a Yeti, an essentially undingable vessel for hauling all your brewskis, La Croixs, and snacks to the beach and beyond. This one comes in a smattering of summery colors and is an extremely rare 25% off (note that Yeti normally never offers deals for Prime Day!).Prime Day Patio Furniture Deals: Outdoor Decor and AccessoriesAnd sure, your patio furniture set is important, but a little decor goes a long way to make an outdoor space more personal and cozy. Spruce yours up with shelving for your plants, lighting to set the mood outside, and cooling accessories to keep you comfortable in the dead heat of summer.Vego Elevated Garden Bed - V SeriesFor anyone trying to get into gardening, these raised beds will give you the motivation you need. Just ask AD staffer Stewart Savin, a gardening enthusiast who calls it a “highlight” in her outdoor space. “Whether you’re a seasoned botanist or a newbie with some seeds and a dream, this bed can fit into any outdoor space,” she wrote in her review. “From patios to balconies and driveways like ours, it can naturalize even the most difficult areas with minimal effort.” They come in a number of colors to match your outdoor aesthetic, too.Bamworld Plant StandTo display your ferns, flowers, and succulents, opt for this multi-plant stand over a traditional flower box. It offers plenty of space for your plants without taking up too much square footage. It’s made from carbonized eucalyptus wood, which means it’s more durable and waterproof than untreated wood.Veradek Outdoor Cooler Side TableFluted detailing is a mainstay for all sorts of furniture, and this outdoor side table has a secret superpower: Slide off the top to reveal a 10.5-gallon capacity ice bucket, so you can keep drinks and your home design as cool as possible.Kbrellaoutlets Patio Umbrella with UPF 50+ ProtectionThis charming pagoda-style umbrella offers UPF 50 protection for scorching summer days, is easily adjustable, and even tilts. We also love the fringed accents, and that the whole thing is coated with a rust-resistant finish.Blissun Patio UmbrellaHere’s another traditional patio umbrella backed by more than 3,600 five-star reviews. Position it in the middle of a dining table, or purchase the brand’s base and add two lounge chairs for your next outdoor reading session (or afternoon nap).UBright Solar Hanging Lights (Set of 2)There’s always a corner that could use a bit more light. One of the best ways to create a moody space is by peppering some hanging lights here and there. This solar design can run for eight hours straight on a single sun-charge.Solo Stove Bonfire 2.0If you’re one of the people who find smelling like campfire smoke more irritating than nostalgic, consider this smokeless number from Solo Stove that’s crafted from stainless steel and includes a removable base plate for cleaning up ash and debris underneath. It’ll come in handy for s’more sessions all summer long.
html:
Last updated 5:02 pm. With summer halfway over, we’re all trying to get outdoors as much as humanly possible, and thankfully, these Prime Day patio furniture deals are here to beautify that plot of land back there you call a yard (kidding, kidding). This year, Amazon has chosen to drop their biggest shopping event of the year, besides Prime Big Deal Days in October of course, over four days this week extending through Friday July 11th.

Featured in this article

A few other things remain consistent with Prime Day, no matter how chaotic this summer sale can be: The deals extend to many of the same items, including weather-resistant dining sets, stylish outdoor sectionals and sofa sets, hardy woven patio chairs and ottomans, and even some aesthetically pleasing fire pits. That means it can be easy to single out what to look for, which our team has already done for you.

Whether you’re looking for grills for summer BBQs, some more prime seating for poolside lounging, or simply dreaming about refreshing a few of your outdoor pieces that stay out on the lawn in all seasons (we see you, Californians), there are a ton of home deals worth shopping now. We scoped out all the patio furniture deals and curated some of our favorites below. And if you’re really in the mood to shop, learn more about our Amazon favorites and review our top choices for furniture, mattresses, sheets, and bath towels.

Prime Day Patio Furniture Deals: Outdoor Couches and Patio Sets

Whether you’re seeking out an outdoor sofa or a conversation set, there’s lots of lounge-worthy outdoor furniture to peruse.

Signature Design By Ashley Paradise Trail Sofa

It’s not every day that one of our favorite outdoor sofas go on sale, but this one (tested by contributor Kristi Kellogg) ranks among the best Prime Day deals we’ve seen so far. “Big, beautiful, and built to last, this sofa has a higher back, deeper seats, and thicker cushions than anything else I could find,” she wrote in her review. “It’s as comfortable as our indoor sofa, and I could easily stretch out and take a nap on it (as could my husband, who’s 6’3).” Even a year later, she said it’s held up so well that she completed her collection with the coordinating swivel chairs and loveseat (Psst…those are on sale, too!).

Yitahome Outdoor Wicker Loveseat

At more than half off, it’s hard to pass on this space-saving rattan loveseat with cushions (plus removable and washable covers!). Add it to a small balcony in a high-rise or create a cozy corner in an expansive backyard with a coordinating coffee table and wicker sofa.

Signature Design by Ashley Horizon Hall Sofa

At first glance, this sofa looks like it was made for your living room. But with weather-resistant wicker and washable performance fabric, it’s all about the outdoors. Tuck it under a pergola and set up a new hangout spot with natural hues to match your surroundings.

Yopto Sectional Patio Set

While it’s not a traditional Prime Day deal, this patio set does come with a special coupon for $104 off, so you can take home this coastal-inspired eucalyptus wood couch and coffee table for 13% off.

East Oak Courtyard Patio Set

This beauty of a four-piece set includes a padded loveseat, two roomy armchairs, and a glass coffee table for all of your outdoor hosting.

Prime Day Patio Furniture Deals: Patio Dining Sets

Create an inviting atmosphere at a more inviting price with these discounts on tables, chairs, or outdoor dining sets for a combo of the two.

Christopher Knight Home Davina Outdoor Dining Chair (Set of 2)

The perforated design and bold yellow colorway are transporting us to iconic midcentury modern homes and hotels in Palm Springs. They’re fun, bold, and fortunately for your wallet, 15% off for a limited time.

Flash Furniture Lila Bistro Set

Or create a more permanent fixture with this three-piece bistro set, including a table with a glass top. Under an awning or cantilever umbrella, you can sip and dine here all summer long.

Christopher Knight Home Spanish Bay Outdoor Dining Table

Add this dining table to the list, too. The industrial metal legs contrast the rustic farmhouse-style acacia wood tabletop.

Grand Patio Premium Frame Patio Bistro Set

So many bistro sets come in splash colorways that it’s kinda nice to buy an all-black set for a gothic summer vibe. This one is blessed with a steel powder-coated frame and backed by thousands of positive reviews.

Best Choice Products Patio Dining Chairs (Set of 2)

Marked down in both colorways (natural/ivory and gray/black), these woven wicker chairs just need an outdoor table for a comfy patio conversation set. Come winter, they can double as indoor seating for additional guests.

Christopher Knight Home Hermosa Dining Set (Set of 5)

We’ve been holding out hope that some of our favorite Christopher Knight Home items would go on sale, and the brand finally delivered with markdowns on tons of best-sellers. Take this five-piece outdoor furniture set, for example, which is made with acacia wood and has water-resistant cushions for more comfortable lounging.

Prime Day Patio Furniture Deals: Outdoor Chairs, Hammocks, and Bar Sets

Amazon is slashing prices on classic hammocks and Adirondack chairs, in addition to long chaises for sunbathing and rocking chairs.

Flash Furniture Mystic Folding Patio Sling Chairs (Set of 2)

For an impromptu backyard bash, tailgating, or even poolside seating, these sling chairs with a mesh back are just the thing for sitting back in comfort. Deceptively lightweight, they even include a foot rest for propping up your toes off the lawn.

Novogratz Poolside Gossip Priscilla Folding Chairs (Set of 2)

These chairs are the quintessential outdoor throne of the season—quite simply made to watch the encroaching sunburns of your little ones who promised they SPFed. Alloy steel and nylon mean these can soak in water without issue but need a thorough sun dry afterwards to drive away mildew and rust.

Safavieh Chaise Lounge Chair

Decorate like a designer when you snag these Safavieh lounge chairs, which you can find in Justina Blakeney’s vibrant Los Angeles backyard. Select colors and patterns are discounted, including striped options fit for the Amalfi Coast (or a yard inspired by it).

Shintenchi 3-Piece Outdoor Rocking Bistro Set

Powder-coated steel makes this set rust- and UV-resistant, which is good because it’s sure to become one of your favorite places to daydream. These seats are modern and chic, and they’re ready to blend right in with any existing design style you’re working with.

YitaHome Outdoor Narrow Egg Chair

Consider this our humble plea to add a funky egg chair to your patio. All variations are discounted right now, so you can choose one with an ottoman or a swiveling seat. It already comes with back and seat cushions, but plop down one of our favorite outdoor throw pillows to complete the look.

Arden Outdoor Chaise Cushion

Whether you’re prioritizing style or comfort, new cushions can lend both elements to your personal lounge area. French Blue Linen (shown here) offers muted colors fit for a countryside cottage, plus there are several striped patterns that could coordinate with Nice’s iconic beach umbrellas.

Y- Stop Hammock Hanging Rope Swing Chair

If you have access to a hanging spot for this cozy outdoor chair, you’ll love taking afternoon naps day after day. There’s a removable steel bar, in case you want to add some more structure to the seat—but we wouldn’t blame you for cocooning right into its folds without it.

Signature Design by Ashley Danson Swivel Lounge Chair (Set of 2)

These wicker lounge chairs are inviting by design, with a curved frame and plenty of supportive cushioning. And did we mention they swivel? Survey your yard or move with the sun throughout the day without lifting a finger, or create a conversation set with this end table.

Prime Day Grilling and Chilling Deals: Coolers and Cooking Appliances

Though it’s not explicitly furniture, don’t act like you’re not enthused to see some Traegers and Yetis on this list, too. Your next outdoor bash or beachside hang deserves some attention to the cookware and coolers you’re bound up grilling with and using to stuff to the brim with ice and beverages.

Traeger Grills TFB30KLF Tailgater Electric Wood Pellet Grill and Smoker

This is the sort of barbecue you see in the backyard when you know you’re about to have the best grilled shrimp of your life and the zucchini coming off this thing will be crisp and juicy—not the stretch-marked cardboard you’ve come to accept. The wood pellet grill infuses everything with the campfire flavor you’re after, and portability means you can easily drag it to the cul-de-sac to star in your block parties.

Cuisinart Chef's Style Tabletop Propane Gas Grill

This portable, hassle-free grill banishes the threat of a grill-free summer. There’s no longer any excuse not to be snacking on roasted red pepper all season. Twist start electric ignition and 22 pounds nearly make this model kid-friendly, if you’re keen on sharing the ways of the grillmaster.

Ninja FrostVault Cooler

Imagine a cold sandwich on the beach, cheese that isn’t sweaty, ham that isn’t room temp, watermelon that maintains its crunch—now imagine 45 quarts of that with something called frostovault technology that’s 20% off. Plus this has a handle and wheels, so you can take it off-roading when the moment calls.

Yeti Tundra 45 Cooler

No cooler on the planet has the same name recognition of a Yeti, an essentially undingable vessel for hauling all your brewskis, La Croixs, and snacks to the beach and beyond. This one comes in a smattering of summery colors and is an extremely rare 25% off (note that Yeti normally never offers deals for Prime Day!).

Prime Day Patio Furniture Deals: Outdoor Decor and Accessories

And sure, your patio furniture set is important, but a little decor goes a long way to make an outdoor space more personal and cozy. Spruce yours up with shelving for your plants, lighting to set the mood outside, and cooling accessories to keep you comfortable in the dead heat of summer.

Vego Elevated Garden Bed - V Series

For anyone trying to get into gardening, these raised beds will give you the motivation you need. Just ask AD staffer Stewart Savin, a gardening enthusiast who calls it a “highlight” in her outdoor space. “Whether you’re a seasoned botanist or a newbie with some seeds and a dream, this bed can fit into any outdoor space,” she wrote in her review. “From patios to balconies and driveways like ours, it can naturalize even the most difficult areas with minimal effort.” They come in a number of colors to match your outdoor aesthetic, too.

Bamworld Plant Stand

To display your ferns, flowers, and succulents, opt for this multi-plant stand over a traditional flower box. It offers plenty of space for your plants without taking up too much square footage. It’s made from carbonized eucalyptus wood, which means it’s more durable and waterproof than untreated wood.

Veradek Outdoor Cooler Side Table

Fluted detailing is a mainstay for all sorts of furniture, and this outdoor side table has a secret superpower: Slide off the top to reveal a 10.5-gallon capacity ice bucket, so you can keep drinks and your home design as cool as possible.

Kbrellaoutlets Patio Umbrella with UPF 50+ Protection

This charming pagoda-style umbrella offers UPF 50 protection for scorching summer days, is easily adjustable, and even tilts. We also love the fringed accents, and that the whole thing is coated with a rust-resistant finish.

Blissun Patio Umbrella

Here’s another traditional patio umbrella backed by more than 3,600 five-star reviews. Position it in the middle of a dining table, or purchase the brand’s base and add two lounge chairs for your next outdoor reading session (or afternoon nap).

UBright Solar Hanging Lights (Set of 2)

There’s always a corner that could use a bit more light. One of the best ways to create a moody space is by peppering some hanging lights here and there. This solar design can run for eight hours straight on a single sun-charge.

Solo Stove Bonfire 2.0

If you’re one of the people who find smelling like campfire smoke more irritating than nostalgic, consider this smokeless number from Solo Stove that’s crafted from stainless steel and includes a removable base plate for cleaning up ash and debris underneath. It’ll come in handy for s’more sessions all summer long.
